name: Pan-Seared Steak
steps: Pat steak dry with paper towel. Salt both sides generously and season with steak spice.
Heat up olive oil in a medium pan (enough to coat the bottom) over medium high heat.
Once hot, place steak in pan and sear for 2-3 minutes.
Flip and add crushed garlic, rosemary, and butter. Baste steak in butter and oil while it cooks for another 2-3 minutes.
Once cooked, let steak rest for 3-5 minutes. Cover with butter and oil from pan and season with pepper.
